title: Tiger and the Flame (1953) Directed by Sohrab Modi | When a queen rises, an empire trembles

sources.title: Tiger and the Flame (1953) Directed by Sohrab Modi | When a queen rises, an empire trembles
sources.description:
In 19th-century India, Queen Lakshmibai of Jhansi rises from a spirited young girl to a fearless leader, defying British colonial rule and rallying her people in a fiery fight for independence. With swords clashing and alliances tested, her unyielding resolve cements her legacy as a symbol of resistance and freedom.

Original title: Jhansi Ki Rani (1953) World-wide: Queen of Jhansi

Director: Sohrab Modi
Writers: Geza Herczeg, Sudarshan, Adi F. Keeka
Stars: Mehtab, Sohrab Modi, Mubarak Mechant
Genres: History, Drama, Biography, Musical, War


0:00:00 Full Movie with subtitles
0:01:44 Manu's father is struck by a British carriage, prompting her to confront the driver with local children.
0:15:45 Impressed by Manu's courage, Rajguru decides to mentor her, envisioning her as a future leader.
0:32:10 At nine years old, Manu marries the much older ruler of Jhansi, Gangadhar Rao, becoming the queen.
0:48:30 Under Rajguru's guidance, Queen Lakshmibai masters combat skills and political administration.
1:05:20 After the death of her infant son, Lakshmibai adopts Damodar Rao, challenging British succession laws.
1:22:50 During the 1857 uprising, Rani Lakshmibai leads her army into battle against British forces.
1:29:30 In a final act of defiance, the wounded Rani continues to fight valiantly before succumbing to her injuries.
